attributes.action: Un Ban Tyler The Creator From The UK

attributes.background:
Last year Tyler The Creator was banned from the UK due to offensive lyrics, by the country who started punk? The sex pistols? Russel Brand? Nigel Firage.
if these people are aloud freedom of speech, British or not, it is absolutely wrong to ban a person from our country for their beliefs.
